column4: (She looks at your gag and giggles.)
(A club member is restrained in your room.  She struggles in her cuffs.)  Hello there, I think I got in trouble.
(A club member restrained a maid in your room.)  Hello there.  As you can see, this maid seems to enjoy trouble.
To make a long story short: I was exploring this dungeon, a maid came in, she locked these cuffs on me, and here I am now.
To make a long story short: I was exploring this dungeon, a maid came in wanting to be cuffed, so I locked her up.
To make a long story short: I was exploring this dungeon, a maid came in, she locked these cuffs on me, and here I am now.
To make a long story short: I was exploring this dungeon, a maid came in wanting to be cuffed, so I locked her up.
(She nods.)  You must be the Mistress I came to interview then.  I'm the journalist, sorry for the confusion.
(She gulps.)  Sorry for the confusion, I'm a journalist.  Are you here for the interview?
I'm a journalist, I came here to work.  Are you here for the interview?
Are you here for the interview?
I work for City News.  I'm here to prepare an article on your BDSM club.
(She blushes.)  I know it sounds strange but I work for City News.  I will prepare an article on your BDSM club.
(She seems nervous.)  I swear it's true!  I work for City News.  I will prepare an article on your BDSM club.
(She bows her head.)  I...  I guess that's why they sent me.  Can we do the interview?

column3: You will get more than an article.
column4: (She seems nervous.)  What do you mean?  Can we do the interview?
(She cringes as you pinch her cheek hard.)  What do you mean?  Can we do the interview?
Can we do the interview?
(She seems very nervous.)  You can't punish me, I'm not a club member.  This is unfair!
(She seems very nervous.)  I'm not a member, I didn't know the rules.  This is unfair!
Yes!  I want a fair trial.  I'm innocent.
Yes!  I want a fair trial.  I'm innocent.
I want a fair trial!  I'm innocent.

column3: Let's do a trial.  (Go get a gavel.)

column4: (She seems furious.)  This is so unfair!  Do what you want, but my article won't be flattering.
You can accuse and judge at the same time?
TO DO
